div.p: Longview Independent School District is an award-winning public 6A school district based in Longview, Texas. In addition to serving the greater Longview area, the district serves the city of Lakeport, most of Easton, and rural areas in eastern Gregg County.

a.title: Board extends leave, staff pay, postpones election

li.a: Board extends leave, staff pay, postpones election

div.p: Longview Independent School District trustees unanimously approved an extension of leave and wage payments for employees while public schools are closed, and postponed board election to Nov. 3rd, following a proclamation Gov. Greg Abbott issued on March 18.
Longview ISD Board of Trustees approved the 2020-21 District Calendar during their March 18 special meeting. Classes will begin Aug. 17, 2020 and end May 25, 2021.
The Longview ISD Foundation has cancelled the April 2nd Lamplighter Awards.

The Director of State Assessments coordinates compliance with the requirements of Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1972.
